com.interpss.dstab.algo

Interface IDStabSolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDStabSolver, DStabSolver3SeqImpl, DStabSolverImpl

    public interface IDStabSolver
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject
    A representation of the model object 'ID Stab Solver'. Interface for implementing DStab solver. The intialization() is called at the beginning. Then for each simulation step, beforeStep(), nextStep() and afterStep() are called in the performSimulation() method. The beforeStep(), nextStep() and afterStep() could be override to implement a different simulation method.
    See Also:
    DstabAlgorithmPackage.getIDStabSolver()

      • getSimuTime

        double getSimuTime()
        return the current simulation time of the solver

      • setSimuTime

        void setSimuTime(double t)
        set the current simulation time to the solver. The only usage of this method is in hybrid simulation with simulation mode switching, so the new simulation can start from where the last simulation stops, which means the time should not be zero.
